resources.string: Welcome to Mizu Apprentice. I will go through all the contents in this page. The animated tank shows, the amount of water left in tank, in percentage. First cardview represents, the amount of water left in tank, in litres. Second cardview represents, the amount of water usage, per day. Third cardview represents, the cost estimation for the, per day usage. Finally, the fourth cardview represents, what you can do with the amount of water left in the tank. I, Mizu apprentice will always be at your service! Happy Helping!
